Hi {{$json.firstName}},

I noticed your interest in {{$parameter.companyName}} solutions

parameters.html:
Pricing Information for {{$json.company}}

Hi {{$json.firstName}},

I saw you were checking out our pricing page. Here's a customized breakdown based on {{$json.company}}'s profile:

Recommended Plan for {{$json.company}}: {{#if $json.enrichedData.clearbit_company.metrics.employees > 100}} Enterprise Plan - Perfect for companies with {{$json.enrichedData.clearbit_company.metrics.employees}} employees {{else}} Professional Plan - Ideal for growing companies like {{$json.company}} {{/if}}
Plan Monthly Price Best For
Starter $99/month Small teams (1-10 users)
Professional $299/month Growing companies (11-50 users)
Enterprise Custom pricing Large organizations (50+ users)
